reason:
STEP 3(c) REFERENCES NODE 1.4.4 FOR FIBER DECOMPOSITION BUT SHOULD REFERENCE NODE 1.4.3.

In STEP 3(c), the node says: 'By the fiber decomposition (Node 1.4.4), this reduces to a sum over (o/q)^x in the k_{nn}-variable.' But Node 1.4.4 is the 'Torus Sum Reduction and Monomial Property' node. The fiber decomposition of the K-integral is actually performed in Node 1.4.3 ('Conductor Analysis and Fiber Decomposition of the K-integral'). This appears to be a cross-reference error. The parent should reference Node 1.4.3, not Node 1.4.4.
